articles.description: MANILA — Cybersecurity experts have uncovered a "rare, wide-scale" advanced persistent threat (APT) drive by Chinese "actors" against internet users in Southeast Asia, particularly in the Philippines.

articles.title: Philippines includes Indonesia in travel ban to ward off COVID-19 Delta variant - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: The Philippines is adding Indonesia to a travel ban that aims to keep out the more infectious Delta COVID-19 variant driving a surge in coronavirus infections in Southeast Asia, Malacañang said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Myanmar anti-coup activists protest as US seeks regional action - CNA
